comments.comments_text: Ivan Perisic (Inter) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat. Inter have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: What a goal! Arturo Vidal plays it to Edin Dzeko (Inter), who finds himself unmarked inside the box and slots a first-time shot past Dumitru Celeadnic into the top left corner. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: The corner by Federico Dimarco (Inter) lacks accuracy as it's hit with too much power. The ball goes out of play and Sheriff Tiraspol will have a goal kick.
